medfateland 0.5.0

    Class "DistributedWatershed"

    DistributedWatershed-class.Rd

    An S4 class that represents a landscape configuration over a grid of coordinates.

    Objects from the Class

    Objects can be created by calls of the form new("DistributedWatershed", ...), or by calls to the function DistributedWatershed.

    Slots

    coords:

    A matrix of pixel coordinates.

    coords.nrs:

    Inherited from SpatialPointsDataFrame but not used.

    grid:

    Object of class "GridTopology".

    grid.index:

    Index of points in full grid.

    bbox:

    Object of class "matrix" with the boundary box.

    proj4string:

    Object of class "CRS" with the projection string.

    data:

    Object of class "data.frame" containing the elevation (in m), slope (in degrees) and aspect (in degrees from North) of every cell.

    lct:

    A character vector with the land cover type of each grid cell (values should be 'wildland', 'agriculture', 'rock', 'artificial' or 'water').

    waterOrder:

    A numeric vector of cell processing order.

    waterQ:

    A list of water discharge values to neighbours.

    queenNeigh:

    A list of neighbours for each cell.

    channel:

    A logical vector indicating whether each cell belongs to the channel network.

    bedrock:

    A data frame of bedrock properties (depth to bedrock, conductivity and porosity).

    aquifer:

    A numeric vector with the water content of the aquifer in each cell.

    snowpack:

    A numeric vector with the snow water equivalent content of the snowpack in each cell.

    forestlist:

    Object of class "list" containing a set of forest objects.

    soillist:

    Object of class "list" containing a set of soil objects.

    xlist:

    Object of class "list" containing a set of spwb or growth model input objects.

    Extends

    Class "SpatialPixelsLandscape", directly. Class "SpatialPixelsTopography", distance 2. Class "SpatialPixelsDataFrame", distance 3. Class "SpatialPixels", distance 4. Class "SpatialPointsDataFrame", distance 4. Class "SpatialPoints", distance 5. Class "Spatial", distance 6. Class "SpatialVector", distance 6.

    Methods

    spatialForestSummary

    signature(object = "DistributedWatershed"): calculates a summary function for all forest stands and returns an object of class SpatialPixelsDataFrame-class.

    spatialSoilSummary

    signature(object = "DistributedWatershed"): calculates a summary function for the soil of all stands and returns an object of class SpatialPixelsDataFrame-class.

    spplot

    signature(obj = "DistributedWatershed"): allows plotting maps of the watershed state.

    plot

    signature(x = "DistributedWatershed", y = "ANY"): allows plotting ggplot maps of the watershed state.

    Author

    Miquel De Cáceres Ainsa, CREAF

    See also

    SpatialPixelsTopography-class, SpatialPixelsLandscape-class

    Examples

    #Structure of the S4 object
showClass("DistributedWatershed")
#> Class "DistributedWatershed" [package "medfateland"]
#> 
#> Slots:
#>                                                                        
#> Name:    waterOrder       waterQ   queenNeigh      channel      bedrock
#> Class:      numeric         list         list      logical   data.frame
#>                                                                        
#> Name:      snowpack      aquifer          lct   forestlist     soillist
#> Class:      numeric      numeric    character         list         list
#>                                                                        
#> Name:         xlist         data   coords.nrs         grid   grid.index
#> Class:         list   data.frame      numeric GridTopology      integer
#>                                              
#> Name:        coords         bbox  proj4string
#> Class:       matrix       matrix          CRS
#> 
#> Extends:
